content: about the pattern ----------------- this is a beginner tunisian crochet pattern for a triangle-shaped bandana with ties perfect for beginners it is constructed from the tip at the bottom and grows with each row with an inbuilt non-curling border on all edges the size is variable and you can make it cover a larger or smaller area by changing the number of row you work the ties are practical and light it is made of light cotton yarn which makes it ideal for wearing on the beach in place of a hat size and measurements --------------------- when meeting gauge and working all row in the pattern the triangle measures 52 cm across the top and 26 cm in depth skill level --------------- beginner you need to know how to make tunisian simple and purl stitches tunisian full stitches and a regular return pass materials --------- * yarn 50 g or 125-160 meters of size 2 cotton yarn at about 250-340 meters per 100 grams - for example 8/4 cotton yarn * hook tunisian crochet hook with cable or straight 5 mm or hook size that gets you gauge 3 5 mm regular crochet hook for binding off and ties * tapestry needle scissors tape measure * optional stitch markers * tools for blocking iron with steam or other steamer blocking mats and pins
